snippet: Johnson & Johnson and its DePuy unit were ordered by a Texas federal jury on Thursday to pay five plaintiffs who said they were injured by Pinnacle metal-on-metal hip implants.
abstract: Texas federal jury orders Johnson & Johnson and its DePuy unit to pay about $500 million to five plaintiffs injured by Pinnacle metal-on-metal hip implants.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson and its DePuy unit were ordered by a Texas federal jury on Thursday to pay five plaintiffs who said they were injured by Pinnacle metal-on-metal hip implants.

headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Ordered to Pay $500 Million to Plaintiffs
headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Ordered to Pay $500 Million to Plaintiffs
